attr.title: Oceanhorn
attr.desc: Oceanhorn: Monster of Uncharted Seas combines captivating storytelling, breathtaking 3D visuals and exciting gameplay into one epic action-adventure experience. In the game you explore the islands of Uncharted Seas, a world filled with many dangers, puzzles and secrets.
attr.inst: Buy the game on GOG and copy all the data to `oceanhorn/data`.
